name: Square (CoolCat7)
description:
Overcome obstacles in a difficult and thorny world! 

Come up with and use the correct path to get to the end!

Features:
  • Level Editor, where you may create your easy /  medium / hard level using different obstacles, spikes, triggers!
  • 9 official levels, to show what the level editor is capable of.
Input:
  • WASD - Player movement.
Input in the editor:
  • WASD - move block (If edit toggle enabled).
  • Delete - remove block (If edit toggle enabled).
  • Q/E - rotate block on 90 / -90 degrees (If edit toggle enabled).
  • Left Mouse Button - create block.
